mapper.select: select member_account_code as memberAccountCode ,member_name as memberName ,member_id as memberId ,member_account_bank as memberAccountBank ,member_account_number as memberAccountNumber ,member_account_date as memberAccountDate ,registration_member_id as registrationMemberId ,member_employee_code as memberEmployeeCode ,department_name as departmentName ,member_position_name as memberPositionName from member_account
